basic.description: An examination of major issues in the philosophy of law. Possible topics to be studies include definitional questions, interpretivism, positivism, punishment and the relationship between law and morality.
basic.subject: PHIL
basic.title: Topics in Philosophy of Law

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 4 and registration in a PHIL Major or Medial Plan and (a minimum GPA of 2.60 in PHIL250 and PHIL257) and (6.0 units in PHIL).
